mapper.select: SELECT ei.chartX, ei.chartY, ei.`name`, ei.model_number, b.weather, b.temperature, b.RTTI, b.fengsu, b.yanwu, b.yudi, b.duche FROM equipment_info ei INNER JOIN (SELECT ri.* FROM (SELECT model_number, MAX(created) created FROM road_info GROUP BY model_number) a LEFT JOIN road_info ri ON ri.model_number=a.model_number AND ri.created=a.created) b ON b.model_number=ei.model_number WHERE ei.state=1
